titles.title: Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-415, by Mr. Dreier.
Making in order motions to suspend the rules on either Wednesday, Feb. 11, or Thursday, Feb. 12, 1998.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 144.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

At the conclusion of debate, the Chair put the question on agreeing to the resolution and announced that, by voice vote, the resolution was agreed to. Ms. Slaughter requested the yeas and nays. Further proceedings were postponed.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 217 - 191 (Roll no. 12).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/5/1998--Introduced. Makes it in order at any time on February 11 or 12, 1998, for the Speaker of the House of Representatives to entertain motions that the House suspend the rules.
